website_summaries.verdict: Safely and easily warms larger spaces quickly.
pros: Great for indoor or outdoor use
Can heat up to 4,250 square feet
Designed with overheating sensors that will shut off the heater
Oversized tires make it easy to transport and store
Provides up to 10 hours of heat
cons: This is the most expensive item on our list

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item from the used/slightly “damaged” available listing. Came with a large dent. My dad popped the dent out and this thing runs AWESOME. Heats up his 5000 square foot shop super well. I keep saying I wish it didn’t run on diesel, because it would heat their house really well if my mom didn’t hate the smell of diesel lol. Definitely worth purchasing and we got it at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bradford

customer_reviews.title: As decribed
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and works like a charm.. UPDATE: After using this for three months non stop it is the BEST heater for the money, bar none...
customer_reviews.author: ellen greer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Second 175,000 BTU Mr. Heater l,ve had. First one lasted over 10 years problem free except for replacing a fuel line with to many hours to count. This one has about 70-75 hrs. so far & runs clean and quieter than old one. I use kerosene only. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really love this heater. Very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have only had it for one winter season in the south but the key to smooth operation is keeping it clean and fueled up.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Swofford

customer_reviews.title: Everybody who works outside needs this beside you in a winter storm
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, this heater has made my life as an installer so much warmer to work in the cold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats very well!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my 40 x 40 uninsulated shop. Even 20 below outside, it only takes about 10 minutes to warm up my shop to t-shirt temp. Does take alot of kerosene, but does the job. No problems and have used for 2 winters.
customer_reviews.author: TMCLEN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Put together, plug it in, hit the button, it fired up. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Heater  175k
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cheaper than anywhere else, heats my 2 car garage in 5mins, shipping was fast, no problems yet... not that I expect any... but very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: MAURICE GORDON

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk X2.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to keep new $17,000 concrete floor warm for the required 26 days. The first one had a loose wire internally so you had to wiggle it to start then stay on. Amazon sent new one that will not shut off/ at 90Deg. it is still running on the lowest settings of 65 deg.
customer_reviews.author: Gayland Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a contractor doing work in NJ. A lot of homes don't have heat and this machine kicks but. Kerosene is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: J.n.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product I have six other machines this looks like it's the best of all, I have a small business I use it for different jobs every other day I had bed experience with other machines so far so good, fast shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhn

customer_reviews.title: This heater is a very overpriced piece of junk. ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater is a very overpriced piece of junk. It has never worked right throws fuel everywhere and smokes. I have called Mr. heater for parts and have had to wait over a hour to talk to someone for parts. Stay clear of this big shinny shop ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: IT will leave you hanging
customer_reviews.text: Being in Afghanistan, where it is DAMN cold at times, I have knowledge of more then a few of these exact shotgun blasts to groin devices. They work GREAT .. for a few hours, when you really need them to work.. the ignition transformer is dead. It lets you know this by spraying fuel all over the area your trying to heat. a handful of them were dead with in the first 10 hours of operation. Junk, and having a hard time finding a source of parts other then the manufacturer. Save yourself frostbite and a headache, Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Whoaaaaa! Not this piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a piece of crap! Bought from our local Rural King, for $318.00 plus tax...my opinion is the decimal was one spot too far to the right, should have been $31.80. Very temperamental, spews sooty black stinky smoke, consumes kerosene like a marathon runner drinks water. It is loud like a jet engine, and the construction while attractive to look at, very cheap. This is not a ready heater or any kind of product anyone who can afford better should own.
customer_reviews.author: Cobhgirl

customer_reviews.title: cheaply built and a alot of problems
customer_reviews.text: bought on amazon 3 years ago for a emergency worked fine for the first 8 hours then quit since then we have replaced the spark ignitor 8 times.so if you do buy one buy alot of them also the legs break off the bottom and bolts come lose.not built tuff like the old ones
customer_reviews.author: W. Roth

product_meta.title: Mr. Heater 175,000-BTU Forced-Air Kerosene Heater, F270370 MH175KTR
product_meta.description: Size:L| Color:MulticolorThe Mr. Heater 175,000 BTU Forced Air Kerosene Heater. Safe, easy warmth for when the temperature drops. Convert your garage, barn, or tool shed into a year-round workspace! This Mr. Heater Forced Air Kerosene Heater delivers up to 175,000 BTUs of chill-chasing warmth when you're working on your truck, farm equipment, ATV and more. Heats approximately 4,250 sq. ft.. Runs up to 10 hours on a full tank. 13.4 gallon fuel tank. Easy-off access panel and side lift handles. Troubleshooting diagnostics with LED indicator. Overheat safety shut-off. Thermostat. CSA Certified.
feature_bullets: 175,000-BTU forced-air kerosene heater up to 4,375 square feet
14-gallon fuel tank provides up to 10 hours of heat; adjustable thermostat
High-output fan; no-flame and over-heat safety sensors with auto shut-off
Power indicator light; cord storage; oversized pneumatic tires for smooth transport
Measures approximately 18 by 40-1/5 by 22 inches; 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars38 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
